mapper.insert: insert into user_course(user_id, course_title, course_start_date, course_end_date, course_desc) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{desc})

insert into user_course_spot(tspot_id, course_id, tspot_order) values
(#{spotId}, #{courseId}, #{index})
mapper.select: select ts.tspot_id, ts.tspot_title, ts.addr1, ts.first_image, ts.latitude, ts.longitude, st.tspot_type_name from user_course uc, user_course_spot cs, travel_spot ts, travel_spot_type st where uc.course_id = #{courseId} and uc.course_id = cs.course_id and cs.tspot_id = ts.tspot_id and ts.tspot_type_id = st.tspot_type_id order by cs.tspot_order
